document_data.mainbody:
ashimi was a variety of seafood in the Realms, consisting of freshly raw fish that had been finely chopped.
* In the land of Kara-Tur, one could find this dish on the island nation of Kozakura and in the Hai Yuan Province of Shou Lung, whose people had learned it from the Kozakurans.
* In Faer√ªn, one could find sashimi being served in the underwater restaurant Sharkeys Bar & Grill.
